document.full_text: the hamas leader in gaza urged militant groups thursday to stick with a de facto truce with israel, announced after fighting last month, so as to give a palestinian reconciliation deal with fatah rivals a chance.
document.title: hamas leader calls to keep truce with israel
lines_and_colors: the hamas leader in gaza urged militant groups thursday to stick with a de facto truce with israel, announced after fighting last month, so as to give a palestinian reconciliation deal with fatah rivals a chance.
